pollute.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to make air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use
pollute.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The factory pollutes the air and water.
The island has been seriously polluted by a copper mine.
The rivers had been polluted with aluminium.
pollute.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to spoil or ruin something that used to be good
pollute.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: an artist spiritually polluted by money and fame
